title: Plan Major Equipment Shutdown
description: A maintenance planner needs to schedule a 10-day major overhaul for a primary crusher at a mine site, coordinating all required resources.

tasks.description: Create a master work order for the crusher overhaul.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully creates the main work order for the shutdown.

tasks.description: Generate a list of all required spare parts from the asset's maintenance plan and check their availability in the warehouse.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent generates a list of 50 parts and confirms 48 are in stock, with 2 needing to be ordered.

tasks.description: Create purchase orders for the missing parts and schedule the shutdown on the master schedule once all parts are confirmed to be available.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent orders the missing parts and tentatively schedules the shutdown pending their arrival.
